product_name: Sea to Summit eVAC Dry Sack
long_description: With its light, slimmed-down design and waterproof, air-permeable eVENT(R) laminate base, this Sea To Summit dry sack is pure genius! This valve-free dry sack uses a breathable base made of waterproof laminate fabric, which allows air to be pushed out yet prevents water from entering. Waterproof, breathable eVent laminate fabric base has reinforced stitching on all stress points for durability. Polyurethane-coated nylon body has double-stitched, sealed seams and reinforced stitching at stress points; white fabric allows visibility of contents. Waterproof, nonwicking Hypalon(R) roll-top closure locks in place with buckle-no compression straps needed! Oval shape resists rolling when laid on its side.
short_description: With its light, slimmed-down design and waterproof, air-permeable eVENT(R) laminate base, this Sea To Summit dry sack is pure genius!
